title: Bloomberg Markets: Bell on Digital Transformation Around Data
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bell on Digital Transformation Around Data
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Peter Bell Senior Advisor Highland Capital Partners Chairman of the Board at Progressly Discussing the digital transformation around data and how it is impacting the world venture captial. Today, hundreds of once acclaimed Fortune 500 companies have either been acquired, gone (or going) bankrupt or just dropped off the list. In many cases technical innovation and disruption (i.e. failure to execute a digital transformation strategy) was a key factor.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
